frontmatter.description: Options for adding components to an assembly.

title: swAddComponentConfigOptions_e
description: Options for adding components to an assembly.

values.description: = Add a part or assembly in its last saved configuration. (See IAssemblyDoc::AddComponent5 )
= Add an assembly with all of its components resolved. (See IAssemblyDoc::AddComponent5)
= Add an assembly with all of its components suppressed. (See IAssemblyDoc::AddComponent5)
